A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a disappointing 8th installment in a powerful narrative. The story threads that were there in #7 were just IGNORED. Poor JJ Abrams who has to pick up from this failure for #9. I would remaster the last Jedi (#8) and try to keep it true to the narrative. It’s such a shame. The director was either stupid or arrogant (I’m thinking arrogant) and Disney was either arrogant or clueless (I’m thinking clueless) in signing off on this drivel.
